io.permazen.maven

Class AbstractSchemaMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.permazen.maven.AbstractSchemaMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMainSchemaMojo

    public abstract class AbstractSchemaMojo
extends AbstractMojo
    Generates a schema XML file from a set of Permazen model classes.

    • Field Detail

      • packages

        @Parameter
protected String[] packages
        Specifies Java package names under which to search for classes with @PermazenType or @JFieldType annotations.

        If no <classes> or <packages> are configured, then by default this plugin searches all classes in the output directory.

      • classes

        @Parameter
protected String[] classes
        Specifies the names of specific Java classes to search for @PermazenType or @JFieldType annotations.

        If no <classes> or <packages> are configured, then by default this plugin searches all classes in the output directory.

      • storageIdGeneratorClass

        @Parameter
protected String storageIdGeneratorClass

        The StorageIdGenerator to use for generating Permazen storage ID's. By default, a DefaultStorageIdGenerator is used.

        To configure a custom StorageIdGenerator, specify its class name like this: 

         <configuration>
     <storageIdGeneratorClass>com.example.MyStorageIdGenerator</storageIdGeneratorClass>
     ...
 </configuration>
        The specified class (com.example.MyStorageIdGenerator in this example) must be available either as part of the project being built or in one of the project's dependencies.

      • schemaVersionProperty

        @Parameter(defaultValue="")
protected String schemaVersionProperty
        The name of a Maven property to set to the auto-generated schema version number. This is the schema version number that will be auto-generated when a schema version number of -1 is configured. This auto-generated version number is based on hashing the generated schema.

      • project

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${project}",
           readonly=true)
protected MavenProject project

        protected void generate(SchemaModel schema,
                        File file)
                 throws MojoExecutionException
        Generate schema XML file, overwriting any previous file.
        Parameters:
        schema - database schema

      • verify

        protected boolean verify(SchemaModel schema,
                         File file,
                         boolean matchNames)
                  throws MojoExecutionException
        Verify that the provided schema is "same version" compatible with the schema defined by the specified XML file.
        Parameters:
        schema - actual schema
        file - expected schema XML file
        matchNames - whether schema must match exactly, or only be compatible with
        Returns:
        true if verification succeeded, otherwise false
        Throws:
        MojoExecutionException - if an unexpected error occurs

      • verify

        protected boolean verify(Permazen jdb,
                         Iterator<? extends File> otherVersionFiles)
                  throws MojoExecutionException
        Check schema for structural conflicts with other schema versions defined by an iteration of XML files.
        Parameters:
        jdb - database instance
        otherVersionFiles - iteration of other schema version XML files
        Returns:
        true if verification succeeded, otherwise false
        Throws:
        MojoExecutionException - if an unexpected error occurs
